channel.title: How to disable shooting without arrows?
channel.description:
Topics name says all... when someone does that, server crashed with this error:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1 at Client.AttackNPC(Client.java:8929) at Client.process(Client.java:852) at PlayerManager.process(PlayerManager.java:118) at Server.main(Server.java:40)
How to make it only say you don't have arrows and cancel attack?

item.title: How to disable shooting without arrows?
item.dc:creator: @scriptz scriptz
item.description:
@scriptz wrote:

Topics name says all…
when someone does that, server crashed with this error:

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1
at Client.AttackNPC(Client.java:8929)
at Client.process(Client.java:852)
at PlayerManager.process(PlayerManager.java:118)
at Server.main(Server.java:40)

How to make it only say you don’t have arrows and cancel attack?

Read full topic
item.source: How to disable shooting without arrows?
